name: Spider Quest (Spagzz)
description:
Spider Quest

IMPORTANT: Play in fullscreen so all sprites show! (Use the WEBGl fullscreen button, not the itch.io one, should be blue and hidden behind the itch.io fullscreen button XD)

Controls: Movement (WASD) Shoot (Left Mouse Click) Sense Ability (1)

TIP: The spider has Jumpscare attacks, so if hes run off for a while, get prepared!

Once you hit play, walk to the dungeon entrance to start your battle!
